'''Estelmo''' was the squire to [[Isildur]]'s eldest son [[Elendur (son of Isildur)|Elendur]].

==History==
In {{TA|2}}, Estelmo accompanied Elendur and Isildur north along the eastern slopes of the [[Misty Mountains]]. They were [[Disaster of the Gladden Fields|ambushed]] by [[Orcs]], and after a blow to the head Estelmo was believed dead. Stunned, the young man survived and was found under Elendur's body.  Estelmo recuperated, and was one of only three [[Men]] to survive the Disaster in which Isildur and [[the One Ring]] were lost. He was able to report the words of Isildur and Elendur when they parted.<ref>{{UT|Gladden}}, p. 276</ref>

==Etymology==
''Estelmo'' is clearly [[Quenya]]. Although it is not glossed, [[Paul Strack]] explains it could mean "Hope-person", from ''[[estel]]'' ("hope") + ''[[-mo]]'' (agental suffix).<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-3364990369.html|articlename=Q. ''Estelmo'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=27 January 2023}}</ref>
